name: Juru Parkir: Indonesian Cultural Game
description:
Juru Parkir is a casual game which tells about the activity of parking attendants at local places in Indonesia. Simply by drag and drop, the objective is to organize the car to park neatly. Remember their characteristics, blue the casual, yellow the hot-headed, and red the slowpoke. The obstacles will get more challenging level by level. While playing, the game will provide some beautiful cultural scenery of Indonesia, and it also filled by remarkable voice-acts in Indonesian language. This game is not only entertaining, but it also shares educational information about Indonesian Culture.

  Features
  1. Meet each driver with his/her behavior.
  2. Discover Indonesia tourist spot.
  3. Learn Indonesia slang~
  4. Unique parking style that only in Indonesia.
  5. Know Indonesia street food seller using motorcycle (coming soon).
  The game still in development!!

Juru Parkir is under development, what you have seen is prototype version with 3 levels and no upgrade feature yet. I'm not sure when it will be done, but I expect around end of 2017 or beginning of 2018.

UPDATE: 2 of my friends can't really help me in development because they're too busy  for their office works (almost OT every day). So I have to carry all stuffs with 1 writer helps me in writing. I expect will finish by next year 2018.

  More info at
